name: Pickles And Physics (DEMO)
description:
This is a demo for an upcoming game I have, Pickles And Physics! Ever wanted to launch a pickle through an obstacle course? no?... well here you go.

CONTROLS

Use AD or <> to look around                                                                                                                                    Click where you want to launch to launch                                                                                                  Press F1 F2 F3 for different views                                                                                                                Press M to go to menu and R to restart

HAVE FUN!
